invention-title: Treatment process of slag slurry in polycrystalline silicon production
一种多晶硅生产中渣浆的处理工艺

abstract.p: The invention relates to a treatment process of slag slurry in polycrystalline silicon production. A treatment process for slag slurry in polycrystalline silicon production comprises the following steps: carrying out solid-liquid separation on a solid-liquid mixed phase after gas-liquid separation of the slag slurry to obtain a solid phase and a liquid phase; carrying out drying, acidic hydrolysis, filter pressing, drying and screening on the solid phase to obtain a solid phase containing silicon powder; reacting the solid phase containing the silicon powder with hydrogen chloride, cooling, and recovering the cooled liquid phase; the liquid phase is subjected to light component removal treatment to recover trichlorosilane and silicon tetrachloride; adding an auxiliary agent into the liquid phase subjected to light component removal treatment to react, and separating out a liquid phase containing pentachlorodisilane, hexachlorodisilane, pentachlorodisiloxane and hexachlorodisiloxane; and carrying out cracking reaction on the separated liquid phase and hydrogen chloride to generate trichlorosilane and silicon tetrachloride, and recovering the trichlorosilane and the silicon tetrachloride. According to the treatment process for the slag slurry in the polycrystalline silicon production, the material classification treatment capacity and the material recycling amount of the slag slurry process can be improved.

本发明为一种多晶硅生产中渣浆的处理工艺。一种多晶硅生产中渣浆的处理工艺，包括：对渣浆气液分离后的固液混合相进行固液分离，得固相和液相；所述的固相经干燥、酸性水解、压滤、烘干、筛分后，得含硅粉的固相；将所述的含硅粉的固相与氯化氢发生反应后，冷却，回收冷却后的液相；所述的液相先通过除轻处理回收三氯氢硅和四氯化硅；再向除轻处理后的液相加入助剂反应后，分离出含有五氯乙硅烷、六氯乙硅烷、五氯乙硅氧烷、六氯乙硅氧烷的液相；再将所述的分离后的液相与氯化氢进行裂解反应，生成三氯氢硅、四氯化硅并回收。本发明所述的一种多晶硅生产中渣浆的处理工艺，可提升渣浆工艺的物料分类处理能力及物料回收利用的量。
